text: Riverdale is an American teen drama television series. The series is based on Archie Comics. It aired on The CW but can also be watched on Netflix. The series has an ensemble cast (multiple characters get equal amounts of time). It is about a group of teenagers discovering mysteries in their town, Riverdale, after a teenager is murdered. == Cast == * KJ Apa as Archie Andrews * Lili Reinhart as Betty Cooper * Camila Mendes as Veronica Lodge * Cole Sprouse as Jughead Jones * Marisol Nichols as Hermione Lodge (née Gomez) (seasons 1–5) * Madelaine Petsch as Cheryl Blossom * Ashleigh Murray as Josie McCoy (seasons 1–4, special guest star season 5): * Mädchen Amick as Alice Cooper * Luke Perry as Fred Andrews (seasons 1–3) * Mark Consuelos as Hiram Lodge (born Jaime Luna) (season 2–5) * Casey Cott as Kevin Keller (season 2–present; recurring season 1) * Skeet Ulrich as F.
